docs.title: Luni
docs.text:
Luni is a Luau linter that delivers real-time diagnostics directly inside Roblox Studio, helping you maintain clean, consistent code as you write.

  • 📦 Intuitive and documented
  • 🛠️ Easy configuration
  • 💻 Studio-first
  • ⚠️ Live script editor warnings

Luni was inspired by Astral's Ruff (a Python linter) and was created to solve a common problem in Roblox development: enforcing consistent code style without relying on external editors or third-party tools like VS Code.
